LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.102: Fear not death, for the soul of the faithful man never dies.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.103: Fear not the creatures of the jungle but those that lurk within your mind.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.104: Fear the shadows; despise the night. There are horrors that no man can face and survive.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.105: Follow the Emperor, and the glory of victory shall be yours
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.106: Foolish are those who fear nothing, yet claim to know everything
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.107: For a warrior the only crime is cowardice.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.108: For every battle honour, a thousand heroes die alone, unsung, and unremembered.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.109: For the foes of Mankind, the only mercy is a swift death
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.110: For those who seek perfection there can be no rest this side of the grave
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.111: Forgiveness is a sign of weakness.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.112: Forward Brothers, with loyalty to victory and glory!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.113: Glory in death is life Eternal
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.114: Happiness is a delusion of the weak
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.118: Hatred is the Emperor's greatest gift to humanity.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.120: He bears the weight of Mankind's ills
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.121: He who allows the alien to live shares its crime of existence.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.122: He who lives for nothing is nothing. He who dies for the Emperor is a hero.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.123: He who picks up the sword against us, shall perish by it.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.125: Heresy must be met with hatred.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.128: Honor is what a pure mind knows about itself
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.131: Hope is the beginning of unhappiness.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.132: Hope is the first step on the road to disappointment.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.133: Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are polluted then the ocean is tainted.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.134: If a job's worth doing it's worth dying for!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.135: If a man dies that another should live, that man's spirit shall eat at the Emperor's table
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.136: If you cannot speak well of your Master, be silent!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.140: In an hour of Darkness a blind man is the best guide. In an age of Insanity look to the madman to show the way.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.141: In courage we have no equals.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.142: In our resolve we only reflect his purpose of will.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.143: In the blazing furnace of battle we shall forge anew the iron will of yet a stronger race.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.144: In the darkest of moments, the Emperor’s light shines brightest.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.145: In the darkness a blind man is the best guide. In an age of Madness look to the madman to show the way.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.148: Inspiration grows from the barrel of a gun.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.149: Intellect is a mask for traitors
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.151: It is better that one hundred innocent fall before the wrath of the Emperor than one traitor kneels before the lords of darkness
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.152: It is better to die for the Emperor than to live for yourself.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.153: It is not in my mind to ask questions that cannot be answered. That is the soul standing upon the crossroad of vacillation. You search for wisdom, but achieve only a stasis of will.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.154: It is not the Horror of War that troubles me but the Unseen Horrors of Peace.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.155: It is the bitter tears that the Gods weep that bind us to their hearts
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.156: It is through the Destruction of our Enemies, that we Earn our Salvation
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.159: Know the mutant; kill the mutant.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.162: Knowledge is power, hide it well.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.164: Know your destination before you set out
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.167: Leniency is a sign of weakness!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.168: Let faith protect your mind and metal your flesh
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.169: Let your soul be armoured with Faith, driven on the tracks of Obedience which overcome all obstacles, and armed with the three great guns of Zeal, Duty and Purity.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.170: Life is a prison, death a release
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.171: Life is a prison, death shall be my release
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.172: Life is the Emperor's currency, spend it well
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.173: Listen not to the alien, look not upon the alien, speak not unto the alien!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.175: Look upon the Emperor's Works and tremble!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.176: Losses are acceptable. Failure is not.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.177: Mankind stands on the shoulders of the Martyred
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.178: May the Emperor's Wrath forever cleanse our souls
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.179: Mercy is a sign of weakness.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.183: No army is big enough to conquer the galaxy. But faith alone can overturn the universe.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.184: No man died in His service that died in vain.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.185: No man died in the Emperor's service that died in vain
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.186: No man that died in the Emperor's service died in vain.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.187: No Mercy. No Remorse. Just Kill.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.188: No pity! No remorse! No fear!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.189: Nobody is innocent, there are merely varying levels of guilt.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.190: Not Even The Dead Know The End Of War
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.191: Nothing Can Hide From The Wrath Of The Emperor.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.192: Nothing inspires revenge quite like cold hearted hatred
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.195: Official! The graves of wariors who have given their lives for the Emperor now outnumber the stars themselves.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.196: Only in death does duty end.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.197: Only the awkward question; only the foolish ask twice.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.198: Only the insane have strength enough to prosper.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.200: "Only the insane have strength enough to prosper;
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.201: only those that prosper truly judge what is sane."
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.202: Only the insane have strength enough to prosper. Only those who prosper may truly judge what is sane.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.204: Only The Lost Understand True Terror
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.205: Only those that follow the guiding light of the Emperor may save their souls.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.206: On the battlefield, valour is the lifeblood of victory.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.207: Our enemies are mortal no longer. Face them squarely and without flinching from duty. Mercy for such as them is self-deception
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.210: Over the faithful, fear has no dominion
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.211: Pain is an illusion caused by fear
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.212: Pain is an illusion of the senses, despair an illusion of the mind
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.213: Pain is an illusion of the senses, despair is an illusion of the mind.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.215: Perseverance and silence are the highest virtues
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.217: Place your trust in the Emperor's steel
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.218: Power resides in the will of the Righteous
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.219: "Praise the sun that brings the dawn Of our final doom."
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.220: Prayer cleanses the soul, but pain cleanses the body
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.221: Pure in body, pure in heart
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.224: Reach out to embrace the glories that will come
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.225: Reason begets doubt; Doubt begets heresy.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.226: Reason is the cloak of Traitors
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.228: Revere the Omnissiah, for it is the source of all power.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.229: Ruthlessness is the kindness of the wise
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.231: Seek no reward but the satisfaction of your Master!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.232: Seek honour as you act, and you will know no fear.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.233: Serve the Emperor today - tomorrow you may be dead!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.234: Sins hidden in the heart turn all into decay.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.235: Smite those that disbelieve, for they have turned from the light and fallen.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.236: Sometimes the good must perish so that the rest survive. The lot of courage is to be sacrificed upon the altar of battle.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.238: "Speed the bolt that brings the end Of enemy and friend."
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.239: Step not from the path of the Emperor.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.240: Study the alien, the better to kill it
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.242: Success is commemorated. Failure merely remembered.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.243: Success is measured in blood; yours or your enemy's.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.244: Survival is no birthright, but a prize wrested from an uncaring galaxy by forgotten heroes.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.245: "The Age of Battle has begun. The fires of war burn brightly from star to star. Everywhere the fortresses of Man are steeped in blood and ancient enemies appear from the darkness. Sensing weakness they gather for the kill. They know as we know that night approaches and all mortal life shall be extinguished. We know, as they cannot, that there shall be a new dawn and a new day when we will rise and they will be driven into the darkness forever."
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.246: The Alien dream is to dance on the grave of Mankind.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.247: The Alien fails because it cannot embrace the Emperor.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.248: The best way of improving a gun is to improve its ammunition.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.249: The blood of martyrs is the seed of the Imperium.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.250: The burden of failure is the most terrible punishment of all
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.251: The common man is like a worm in the gut of a corpse, trapped inside a prison of cold flesh, helpless and uncaring, unaware even of the inevitability of its own doom.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.252: The cosmos cries out for salvation
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.253: The Dark Gods laugh at the foolishness of meek appeasers
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.254: The dead cannot cry out for revenge; it is a duty of the living to do so for them
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.255: The dead watch over us and guide us.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.256: The difference between heresy and treachery is ignorance
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.258: The Emperor asks only that you hate
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.259: The Emperor asks only that you obey
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.260: The Emperor bestows upon us the gift of intolerance.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.262: The Emperor is our guiding light, a beacon of hope for humanity in a galaxy of darkness. As we serve him, he is our greatest servant. As we pray to him, his thoughts are only for us. And in the dark when the shadows threaten, the Emperor is with us, in spirit and in fact.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.264: The Emperor knows, the Emperor is watching
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.265: The Emperor will not judge you by your medals and diplomas but by your scars.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.266: The Emperor's mercy is neither to forgive nor to forget but to accept.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.267: The Emperor's judgement is a blessing for the Faithful.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.269: The ends always justify the means.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.270: "The enemies of the Emperor fear many things. They fear discovery, defeat, despair and death. Yet there is one thing they fear above all others. They fear the wrath of the Space Marines!"
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.271: The fear of death is more to be dreaded than death itself
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.272: The flesh is weak. The weak shall perish.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.273: The flesh of your body is a reminder of your own mortality. Transcend the flesh and know immortality.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.274: The foolish man puts his trust in luck, the wise man puts his trust in the Emperor.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.276: The greatest man is but a ripple on the surface of space.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.277: The guilt of heresy weighs heavy on the soul.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.278: The heretic shall reap as he sown - the bitter harvest of vengeance and death.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.280: The justice of your action is measured by the strength of your conviction.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.281: The keenest blade is righteous hatred.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.282: The loyal servant learns to love the lash
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.283: The man that sings the Emperor's praise will speak a blessing all his days.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.284: The man who has nothing can still have faith.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.285: The Martyr's grave is the foundation of the Imperium.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.286: The Mighty have no room for doubt.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.287: The more one learns of the alien, the more one will come to loath it.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.288: The mortal burden carried dutifully to its destination is the Emperor's greatest praise.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.289: The most deviant mind is often concealed in an unblemished body.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.290: The Mutant bears his heresy on the outside, the Traitor hides it in his Soul.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.292: The only reaction to treachery is vengeance.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.293: The path of righteousness leads to the palace of wisdom.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.294: The Priesthood of Mars maintain our Emperor's throne. Thusly do they underpin the Imperium entire.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.295: The reward for treachery is retribution.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.296: The rewards of tolerance are treachery and betrayal.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.297: The road to purity is drenched in the blood of the martyred.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.298: The same hammer that shatters the glass, forges the steel.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.299: The seed of heresy rests in the minds of reasonable men
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.300: The strength of Humanity is the Emperor.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.301: The traitorʹs hand lies closer than you think.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.302: The truly heroic trust in blind faith.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.303: The truly wise are always afraid.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.304: The truth is terrible to bear.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.305: The universe is a big place and, whatever happens, you will not be missed...
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.306: The wage of negligence is utter destruction.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.307: The weak will always be led by the strong. Despise the weak for they shall flock to the call of the Daemon and the Renegade.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.308: "The weapon slays where the hand wills Serve the Emperor!"
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.309: The will of the Emperor is the might of the Imperium.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.310: The wise man learns from the deaths of others.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.311: The word of the Emperor is the rule of the Imperium.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.312: Their defeat is not a matter of when but how.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.313: There are no answers. Only Death.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.314: There are no walls strong enough to protect the enemies of Mankind.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.315: There is no being so foul as the traitor.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.316: There is no cowardice in faith.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.317: There is no fear in conviction.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.318: There is no greater glory than a lifetime of dutiful service.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.319: There is no peace amongst the stars, only an eternity of carnage and slaughter and the laughter of thirsting gods.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.320: There is no right or wrong in our profession. The present changes the past from moment to moment. Only pray for the future to vindicate your action.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.321: There is no salvation without suffering.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.322: There is no substitute for zeal.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.323: "There is no time for Peace. No respite No forgiveness There is only WAR!"
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.324: There is nothing to fear but failure.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.325: There is only the Emperor, and he is our shield and protector
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.326: There is purity of purpose in the faith of the just.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.327: They who feast today do so in ignorance of their mortality. Tomorrow they must die or change.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.328: This is a dark and terrible era where you will find little comfort or hope. If you want to take part in the adventure, then prepare yourself now.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.329: Those who act in honour cannot fail.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.330: Though my guards may sleep and ships may lie at anchor, our foes know full well that big guns never tire.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.331: "Though silver in your palms weighs light Compared to death by blast and sword, Do not shy the hopeless fight, For endeavour is its own reward."
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.332: Thought begets Heresy; Heresy begets Retribution.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.333: Through the destruction of our enemies we earn our salvation.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.334: Timidity begets Indecision; Indecision begets Treachery.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.335: To a Space Marine the boltgun is far more than a weapon, it is an instrument of Mankind's divinity, the bringer of death to his foes, whose howling blast is a prayer to the gods of battle.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.336: To admit defeat is to blaspheme against the Emperor.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.338: To die without purpose is not a service.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.339: To err is to invite retribution.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.340: To fail in the service of the Emperor is the greatest of sins.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.341: To fault the Emperor's Word is an act of sedition.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.343: To question the Emperor's will is to embrace heresy.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.344: To serve Him is to worship Him.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.345: To withdraw in disgust is not apathy.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.346: To withdraw in disgust is not cowardice.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.347: True faith is blind and justified.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.348: True happiness stems only from duty.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.350: Trying to understand weakens the will to act.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.351: "Vengeance is your sword. Hatred is your shield. Loyalty is your Armour."
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.352: Victory needs no explanation; Defeat allows none.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.354: Vigilance is the brother of truth.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.357: We are all a weapon in the hands of the Emperor.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.358: We are bound by the blood of Martyrs.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.361: We must be as unsleeping in vigilance, swift in judgement, merciless in deed.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.362: We must endure the present so that those who follow may continue our endeavours.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.363: "We shall carry our word, We will correct and unify, Hail the Emperor!"
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.364: "Weigh the fist that strikes men down And salutes the battle won."
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.365: What a pity it is that we can die but once to serve our Emperor!
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.366: What fear of death have we who know there is immortality in the great and noble deeds of men?
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.367: "What is the terror of death? That we die our work incomplete. What is the joy of life? To die knowing our task is done."
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.368: "What is your life? My honour is my life. What is your fate? My duty is my fate. What is your fear? My fear is to fall. What is your reward? My salvation is my reward. What is your craft? My craft is death. What is your pledge? My pledge is eternal service."
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.370: Wisdom is the beginning of fear.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.372: Words do not win wars. Deeds do.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.374: You are either for the Emperor or you are his bitter foe
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.375: You are not required to think, only to act
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.376: You are the Emperor's Chosen. Hear His great anger in the roar of the bolt pistol. See His almighty fury in the blades of the chainsword. Feel His undying strength in the protection of your armour.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.377: You carry the Emperor's will as your torch. With it destroy the shadows.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.378: Your freedom must be bought in the currency of toil, tears and blood; a price all men can pay.
LanguageData.OG_ThoughtOfTheDay.tips.379: Your honour is your life. Let none dispute it.
